title: The Night Dream
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Madison Hu]
I think I had a nightmare, my hands were made of cheese
I grew another kneecap on my leg each time I sneezed
My feet were baked potatoes, my arms were candy canes
I had this weird sensation I had hot sauce in my veins
[Pre-Chorus: Madison Hu]
Wait a minute, is this for real?
Here comes my dad, he looks normal
Oh my God, he has my journal!
[Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & Madison Hu]
Dream or nightmare? Nightmare or dream?
So disorienting, who knows what they mean?
Dream or nightmare? Nightmare or dream?
In one we slumber, in one we scream!
[Verse 2: Olivia Rodrigo]
Once I had this crazy dream I was a huge rock star
My biggest psycho fan was trapped inside my guitar
It was a little monster who kept banging on a drum
The worst part was it tried to bite my hand each time I strummed
[Pre-Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo]
Wait a minute, how could all of this be true?
There goes my dog doing something very bad
Oh my gosh, he's walking my dad!

[Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & Madison Hu]
Dream or nightmare? Nightmare or dream?
So disorienting, who knows what they mean?
Dream or nightmare? Nightmare or dream?
In one we slumber, in one we scream!
